briefdescription.para: HardFOC UART event types (mapped from ESP-IDF events).

memberdef.definition: using hf_uart_event_callback_t = bool (*)(const hf_uart_event_t* event, void* user_data)
memberdef.name: hf_uart_event_callback_t

simplesect.para: true to yield to higher priority task, false otherwise

memberdef.definition: using hf_uart_break_callback_t = bool (*)(uint32_t break_duration, void* user_data)
memberdef.name: hf_uart_break_callback_t

briefdescription.para: UART break detection callback function type.

simplesect.para: true to yield to higher priority task, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: ESP32 UART type definitions for hardware abstraction.

detaileddescription.para: This header defines only the essential UART-specific types used by the EspUart implementation. Clean and minimal approach.
